_sText:
Map Made By: «SG.Mem» Krazy



Version 2 Updates:

~Decreased size of first trap.
~Added a Break animation to first trap.
~Moved Sentries in Spawn to the side.
~Added Warning signs to the fire trap / electric trap.
~Fixed bug with fire trap where it wouldnt do damage.
~Increased the size of the hit box on electric floor trap.
~Added Blood Stains to the floor by the spike trap to help mark it.
~Fixed the explosion trap so it does damage now.
~Added a more noticable afk-killer system (Gas pours into spawn).
~Increased push speed of trap 12
~Added an Env_Stream effect to fan trap 2 (Trap 14)
~Increased size of the ending walkway
~Added an electric trap (Trap 16).
~Added a turret gunshot trap (Trap 17)
~Made the map 100% indoors
~Added a new easter egg
~Added a new endgame room (Climb)
~Made Map Brighter
~Changed textures on teleporters
~Adjusted position of Easter Egg 1


Version 2.1 Updates:

~fixed trap 1 bug
~Temporary fix to trap 15
~Adjusted position of all easter eggs
~Fixed Climb Bug
~Fixed Bhop Bug
